    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AceRuleVisitor
    Visitor for applying the Ace scoring rule.
    AIStrategy
    Abstract base class for AI player strategies.
    Card
    Abstract base class representing a card in the JEST game.
    Deck
    Represents the deck of cards used in the JEST game.
    DefensiveStrategy
    Defensive AI strategy for virtual players.
    FinalScoreVisitor
    Visitor for calculating final Jest scores.
    Game
    Main game controller for the JEST card game.
    Game.TrophyType
    Trophy types based on card conditions.
    HumanPlayer
    Represents a human player in the JEST game.
    HumanStrategy
    Strategy for human players using console input.
    InputHandler
    Singleton class to handle all console input.
    Jest
    Represents a player's Jest (collection of won cards).
    JokerCard
    Represents the Joker card in the JEST game.
    JokerRuleVisitor
    Visitor for applying the Joker scoring rule.
    Main
    Main entry point for the JEST card game.
    Numbers
    Enumeration of card numbers/values in the JEST game.
    OffensiveStrategy
    Offensive AI strategy for virtual players.
    Offer
    Represents a player's offer during a round.
    Player
    Abstract base class representing a player in the JEST game.
    PlayStrategy
    Interface for player decision-making strategies.
    Round
    Represents a single round in the JEST game.
    ScoreVisitor
    Visitor interface for calculating scores.
    Suit
    Enumeration of card suits in the JEST game.
    SuitCard
    Represents a suit card in the JEST game.
    Trophy
    Represents a trophy in the JEST game.
    TrophyScoreVisitor
    Visitor for tracking card information relevant to trophy conditions.
    VirtualPlayer
    Represents an AI-controlled player in the JEST game.
